item.title: Challah Bread
item.description: A kind of braided bread preparation. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 20 min üç≥ Cook time: 40 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 2-4 NOTE: Prep time does not account for the 3-4 hours the dough must be left to rise and cool (see directions 5, 10, & 12). Ingredients 600ml ( 1 Pint ) warm water 1 tablespoon dry active baking yeast 7 tablespoons honey 1.5kg flour 3 eggs 1 tablespoon salt 1 tablespoon poppy seeds 4 tablespoons olive oil Directions Fill a large bowl with the water, and sprinkle with the yeast.
